greeting.title: Hello, I'm -
greeting.name: Artem Rozzhyvin

main.part2: developer with a passion for exploration and continual learning. I am a highly motivated person, willing to work in a team or as an individual worker as well.

greeting.contact: I'm currently open to new opportunities, so feel free to contact me.

main.part1: Hello everybody! My name is Artem, I am an ambitious
main.part2: developer from Ukraine. Every day I learn something new, improve my skills in practice and theory. I strive to apply my experience and skills to help businesses and companies achieve their goals by creating user-centric digital products.
main.part3: In my free time from the code, I spend it with my family, friends, watching series or shows about travel. I also like to read some non-fiction books, especially on the topic of psychology.

projects.title: Featured projects
projects.main: These are my projects in which I study and improve my skills and abilities.
projects.reactPizza: The site is an online store selling sneakers. The site has several pages: main, shopping cart, favorites, purchased. The site also has animations and is fully responsive. A fake api was used on the motskapi service.
